page.title: 16Local Survey
page.content: The survey of Willingham showed us that it is a larger village than Upton and has a slightly higher unemployment figure.The main problem in the village is the road that passes through it.The road has two very nasty bends on it which cause quite a lot of problems. The figures that we used for the village are the same type as the ones we used for Upton{ {Willingham} 1951 Population 404 1961 Population 408 1971 Population 418 1981 Population 498 In 1981 there were 236 males and 262 females living in the village.The population breakdown is interesting. Age 0-4:22 people Age 5-14:82 people Age 15-34:81 people Age 35-retiring:172 people
